instructions: Roll templates now implemented; see descriptions and other information in new Roll Template section at bottom of sheet. All macros aret translated in italian language for italian community. Attack and full attack rolls modifiable in-sheet to allow inclusion of feat- or item-based additions to attacks.  Full attack gives 'undefined' error for attacks one does not have a BAB defined for (remove that part of the macro if BAB is not high enough for 2, 3, or 4 attacks/rnd)
